attributes.action: keep Chris Moyles as the Breakfast Show presenter on BBC Radio 1.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Chris Moyles should not be 'axed' by BBC bosses as the presenter of the Breakfast Show slot on BBC Radio 1.
He has served a wonderful career in the Breakfast slot and many loyal fans and listeners will be sad to see him 'axed'.
We the signed would like to keep Chris Moyles as the Breafast Show presenter for at least two more years.

rejection.details: This is a decision for the BBC - it is outside the remit of the PM.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
